entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Yoho (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:52 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yoho National Park 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

Humidity: 75 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
